Dogowar tambayoyin Yarda

 Idan kun sanya yatsanku a kan na'urar daukar hoto, zai rubuta bayanai game da sawun yatsa. Zai kuma rikodin wurin da aka kwatanta da wannan samfurin, da kuma lokaci da kwanan wata na scan.


Duk waɗannan bayanan naku za a adana ta Simprints Technology Limited, kungiya mai zamar kanta daga Britaniya.


Simprints za su yi amfani da bayaninka don taimakawa wajen gane ka a nan gaba, kuma ya dace da ku zuwa ajiyeyen bayani.


Simprints zata yi amfani da bayaninka don inganta daidaitattun sabis ɗin, kuma zata iya raba shi tare da wasu masana don wannan dalili.

Development Worker Consent

 Simprints Technology Limited will analyse data relating to your use of the Simprints app in order to improve that app for you, and other development workers. Simprints will also store the location where each fingerprint scan takes place, and the time when it occurs, in order to provide its services to beneficiaries.
